date.center: Petition for Allowance of Appeal Denied January 15, 1982.

opinion.posture: Criminal proceedings. Burglary, theft by unlawful taking and theft by receiving stolen property. Before KUBACKI, J. No. 637 Philadelphia 1980. Appeal from the judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County, Criminal Division, No. 1000, July T., 1979. Submitted: December 5, 1980.
opinion.attorneys: William J. Perrone, for appellant;Page 647 Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HESTER, SHERTZ and WIEAND, JJ.
